definition: (of houses, scenery etc) magnificent (idiom)
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself
the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
excellent
surname Huan

sentences.english: Along the way are remote mountains, deep valleys, so green, so beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 沿途崇山峻嶺，溝谷深陷，綠水青山，美輪美奐。

sentences.english: In this world, many things are beautiful, charming.
sentences.chinese: 世上，許多的事物都美輪美奐，令人陶醉。

sentences.english: Imagine you're surrounded by the beautiful forest in the painting on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 牆壁上美輪美奐的畫讓您彷彿置身於叢林，心曠神怡。

sentences.english: I want to take a moment with you all to recognize this marvellous stadium.
sentences.chinese: 此刻，我想與大家一同欣賞這座美輪美奐的體育場。

sentences.english: We are amazed by the grandeur of the Oriental Pearl.
sentences.chinese: 美輪美奐的東方明珠塔讓我們感到震撼。

definition: (idiom) to gasp in amazement/to acclaim as the peak of perfection
the eye cannot take it all in (idiom); too many good things to see/a feast for the eyes
all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
gorgeous/magnificent
(of houses etc) sumptuous (idiom)
living spirit, living image (idiom); true to life/vivid and realistic
in different poses and with different expressions/in thousands of postures (idiom)
gold and jade in glorious splendor (idiom)/fig. a dazzling sight (e.g. royal palace)
original and ingenious (idiom)/to show great creativity
dazzling/brilliant
countless changes/constant permutation
to imitate to perfection/to be remarkably true to life
place of cultural interest
dazzling (idiom)
outstanding/peerless/beyond compare
nothing more beautiful can be imagined (idiom)
